entry.source: I am Isis, the mother goddess of Egypt.{F801}My husband has been murdered by evildoers,{F801}and now his coffin has been stolen. It has{F801}been dropped in a river within a cave named{F801}Naraku. I would like someone familiar with{F801}the area to meet me {F804,5}on the second level.{F804,0}{F801}
